content.detailedDescription: I saw the same ufo many thousands did in arizona in 1997 or 1998. it was huge, v shaped with five lights(white) on underside of ufo. of course the next day the arizona government made a big joke of it. the government as well as the military denied everything. i watched this ufo for a very long time. it was scary. this is not the only ufo i have seen in my life. i have seen more and each time there has been other witnesses. i watched this ufo along with thousands of other people who saw it. i was in phoenix at the time. when i first saw it i knew it was a ufo right away. it was huge and it moved slowly across the sky so many people knew what they were looking at. it was no airplane or anything like ive ever seen before.
content.summary: This was a very huge ufo seen by thousands

content.detailedDescription: Linda derrick and i lived on 1200 ac in duffo texas we had nothing to do and put chairs out in the front of the house and watched the stars in the sky we noticed a light hovering over the tree line in front of the property and it moved around there for about 20 min. it then took of and headed straight up and began to move from one side of the horizon to the other flashing colored lights like a strobe or ---- ---- from the distants it looked like a long cigar. it came close to the house and then moved in the sky for an hour giving us a show. i saw a plane moving   the in sky and it moved in toward it and flew with it for some time and then came back to our house i told linda lets try to communicate with it so i started to use the porch lite and turned it on and off two short one long two short. it did not take long for it to notice us and flew over the house as close as the lite pole was next to the house it was silent and its shape was like a triangle and black... it was so exciting. my father john l fererro was a marine and built airplanes and he also worked for nasa and built the engins on the space shuttle... so i know aircraft this was not the new stealthy plaines they have now because they dont hoover or fly with out any sound... anyway the craft flew over the property and did this for a long time i told linda i cant see our goverment using there aircraft on us and use so much fuel for so long of a time. it desided to land in the back of the house and when it did the 4 dogs we had and all the cows and other animals began to go crazy screeming about what was happening. i began to think to myself as i watched it in the back im going to have a heart attack im so scared. i assumed if whatever was flying it was comming out and trying to come to the house when we heard a gun shot and then we heard a scream that i have never heard before then it took off fast and we watched it move to a star and position itself in front of it and stayed the star pattern was shaped like a kite.. we watched the sky for an hour and noticed small orb like objects moving in formation and all over the place. when all this happended we thought to ourselfs if they had of visited we only had coffie to offer them no drug wish we were on drug so we could explain to ourselfs we were stoned out of our minds and what we saw... the next day a car pulled up and some one got out wearing a hot pink silk shirt did not stop to talk to use drove off. cowbows dont were silk hot pink silk shirts. dont know about that... only told friends about what happend not to long after that i joined the navy and moved to pensacola florida and   photography school in 74. in 2000 was again in pensacola and met the man that had taken photos of a ufo while working at the tiki house motor lodge. use to think about a friend that lived in phoinex ar a lot and the ufo lites were seen there. and now in jan 1 lost my sister she hung here self in arlington tx and heard that the ufo were seen over stevenville tx. i think about the ufo we saw all the time and think they are trying to communicate with us i use the porch lite and they noticed ... thats about all i can say that happened to use hope you can use my experience to communicte with them as i did
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: No sound lots of lights  colors  triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Call me you love my event i didn't....
content.summary: Help''''

content.detailedDescription:
As stated in the tagline, this is not a first-hand account. it is more like a third-hand account.

i am currently located in westmoreland co. pa. my sister called me from weston, wv earlier today to inform me that she and other members of my family were en-route to i-79 near jane lew to check out a ufo that was being reported over the police scaner. 

according to her, the object was described by callers as being "large and round with a lot of lights." it was described (presumably by police and other officials as a "suspicious aircraft" the event, according to my sister, had gone on for nearly an hour before they decided to check it out. by the time my family arrived at the scene, the incident was over.

again, i was a state away at the time. i just wanted to give you a heads up! it's a small area, so it should not be to hard for an investigator to track down info, witnesses and any photos/recordings.  a good place to start would be with the newspaper that covers the area, the weston democrat.  tell them that their former sports editor sent you. 

here's some interesting info about the general area in which the sighting appearently occurred:

in the summer of either 1993 or 1994, a ufo was sighted in the area (within a few square miles).  the incident resulted in a wv state police trooper wrecking his cruiser while en-route to the area. video of the object supposably exists (or, rather, existed at the time). i have not, however, seen the vidoe/photos.

the general area was also the home of ufo investigator gray barker and saucerian books.



chad samples
content.summary: This is not a first-hand account. just fyi!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down interstate 26 south towards charleston, sc this morning, 10 feb 08, at 10:10 am, when i saw what appeared to be a comet.  it was about a mile away to my left and ahead of me, across the interstate and about 1000 feet above the earth.  my first thought was, "what the heck is that?"  and then, "no one is going to believe me when i tell them i saw this strange thing."  i really wished i had my camera with me but i didn't.  

i thought at first it was a plane crashing but it was coming almost straight down with such a forceful trajectory that i thought maybe it was a comet.  so i pulled over to watch it and it came to a stop and appeared to hover and then sped down going south above the tree line along i-26 until i lost sight of it; about 3 - 4 minutes later.  

it was a clear beautiful day, sunny blue skies.  what caught my eye about this thing was the "tail" behind it - energy trail or whatever.  it was definately not an airplane or helicopter.  it was something i've never seen before, can not describe its shape - only to say it may have been round.  it traveled very fast when it came to a horizontal point above the tree line and was out of sight in about 3 or 4 minutes as i stated above.  i felt nothing out of the ordinary during the siting - just called my best friend during it and my mom afterwards to tell them what i saw.

way off in the distance, at the same time i first saw this comet like thing, i saw what looked like the contrail of one of our military jets.  a few minutes after this ufo disappeared, again, way off in the distance, i saw 2 contrails which looked like to be from 2 of our own military jets.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Comet like ufo descended downward then flew horizontally

content.detailedDescription: Woke me up in bed light in house western sky couldnt get perspective close or far ? viewd with binoculars  30 secs moved out of sight  appeared north  for 10 mins uneasy feeling didnt turn on house lights  felt as it was aware
content.summary: Disco ball silver red green blue pulsateing right top

content.detailedDescription:
Early friday morning i had just filled my second cup of coffee, and wondered out on my back deck to gaze at the stars noticing how beautiful venus and mars look in their morning cycle. it was getting cold so just as i started to head in i gazed directly overhead noticing a rather large triangular "something" cruising through the sky's. it had three bright lights on each corner, and no stars were visible with in the triangle, telling me what i was seeing is a solid craft. i then quickly grabbed my camera, and as i headed back out side i saw the craft quickly jog to the north, then stop. that's when i saw a smaller triangular craft rise up from behind a hill. it trailed some kind of plasma exhaust as it rose to meet the larger craft. just then the larger craft shot a beam towards the smaller craft. this lasted about 9 seconds when the smaller craft shot off into the night unbelievably quick. almost at the same time the larger craft disappeared. to my surprise when i examined my snapshot i had captured the event. there has been strange events happening over the skies of evergreen for two weeks prior to this event. lights appearing in locations, disappearing, and appearing in another spot. lights hovering then slowly drifting around to then disappear. all along in the back of my mind, i'm saying to my self, "what's going on"? then my event occurred. it left a strange felling over me, not knowing what next to do.
so now i have an excellent digital picture for your examination. that is if i can send you an e-mail attachment. make sure you zoom in, there you'll see a trailing exhaust from the smaller craft, plus a weird looking beam.
chad eckdahl
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Larger triangular flies over, meets up with smaller ufo that lifted off ground behind hill. energy beam from larger ufo hits smaller ufo. after about 9 mins. smaller flys off, larger disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
February 10, 2008
it was a clear night at around one am, new moon, about 60 degrees fareinhiet, winds from the north at around 3-5 mph.  

i was cuddling with a friend on the roof of some random strip mall in south austin staring at the stars as ussual, when i observed what first appeared to be a shooting star directly above us and a bit to the south. i've seen hundreds of shooting stars in my day, so i am fairly certain that the phenomena i observed last night was not in keeping with with anything i've witnessed previously. 

the entire event lasted about two seconds, and in that time i observed changes in the velocity of the /craft/ light/ energy body/ illuminati saucer/  flying spaggheti monster/ that occured so rapidly that only a very attentive viewer would even have picked up on it. the changes in direction were more obvious: a few degrees to the north, a few degrees to the south, back towards the north, ang gone. i am not certain as to how fast the human body can travel without being damaged, but i would wager that no human body could endure such rapid changes in velocity and direction. the object did seem to slow immidiately before each turn, only to return to "shooting star" speed almost instantly. it all happened so quickly that i cannot be certain of this.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
previous sightings:

february 2nd, 2008
today, while lying on the rocks with some hippies in the barton creek greenbelt, i observed a very distant point of silver light hovering motionless in what i assumed to be the upper atmosphere. i immidiately turned to my friends and said, "i think thats a u.F.O.". they were excited, but not as surprised as i had expected. one of my friends turned to me at once and said, " yeah, juan here's been tellin' us 'bout em'. says he's seen em flyin around on and off all day." (typical, huh?) juan jumped up from his crosslegged position and asked me to point it out for him. i assume that the others present were to intoxicated to make out such a small light, or perhaps they just didn't care. (i was only under the influence of the ussual nicotine buzz, and jaun quit drinking a couple of weeks ago)

we watched it for a few minutes and observed niether any change in the position nor the intensity of the light for several minutes. it appeared to be composed of a highly reflective metallic substance, but i wouldn't make a bet on that assertion. it dissapeared abruptly after about 6 minutes, and i did not see any other lights.

the sky was a deep, healthy shade of blue during the sighting, and there were no visible clouds in the vicinity. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
march 16, 2007

i was lying alone in a field behind the barton springs pool at around 10 in the evening. the sky was clear, the moon was absent, and the stars were blazing. i noticed what appeared to be a satelite, directly above me, moving in a direct line from the east/northeast, toward the west/southwest. soon after my eyes settled on the object, the light it /reflected /produced /was composed of gradually became more intense, and within two or three seconds the object was by far the brightest object in the night sky. it was about a quarter of the size of the moon when the light reached maximum intensity. it began to dim immidiately, gradually, and it faded completely out of view within a few seconds. it moved very slowly, as if orbiting the earth. it moved at the exact speed of a sattelite. friends have conjectured that i may have seen the space station. i doubt it greatly.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

march 10, 2007
second sighting.
 barton hills. fixed point of silver light directly above, 1pm, partly cloudy. pointed it out to a lady who was a vollunteer worker on the trails  near campbells hole in the barton creek greenbelt. she told me it was just venus. i told her to look again. she did, and was startled to find that a second stationary point of light, dimmer, had appeared about three degrees south of the first point. she then asked me what i thought they were up to. i told her i didn't know, but that i assumed they wanted us to know they were there. the lights disappearered shortly thereafter.   
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
march 8th, 2007
first sighting. 10 am, barton springs pool. mostly clear sky, deep blue. fixed point of silver light. stared at it in wonder for over 20 minutes, then observed second stationary point of light appear very suddenly, directly beside the first. closed eyes, opened left, observed two lights. closed left, opened right. still two. not seeing double. excitement growing. second point disappears, reappers moments later, this time hovering around the first. i lost it, went running down the trail shouting ufo! ufo!
content.summary: "shooting star" makes a sharp right, left, back to the right, gone. austin.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking for shooting stars after 9pm on feb 9 '08.
saw something, sort of like a planet but it moved.

thought it was a plane, far away, but it changed
speed and direction quickly and randomly. went from
small and far away to very much closer.

sometimes round, with big red and white lights.
sometimes with a tail with red and white lights.

resembled the way a helicopter would behave
but there is no reason for there to be helicopters
that high up in altitude and still so big yet, especially
over the blank desert where this happened at night.

other times over this are there have been
giant fireballs which light the night sky up
like daytime for 4 seconds. those might be
meteors perhaps.

and it is easy to say this was just the sighting 
of arcturus. it was in the same part of the sky. but
it would have to be some crazy angle of declination
madness for this to make just one star appear to
rise, fall, zip left or right, make u-shaped 
maneuvers and generally weave around in the sky.

i made someone look with me. they said i was
wrong but then they saw it too. we were shouting
back and forth hey do you see it, did you see that?

it was pretty cold and eventually the mystery
didn't seem worth standing outside being cold
so we went in and stopped looking.
content.summary: Moved like a gigantic helicopter, circle with a tail behind, changed shapes

content.detailedDescription: It was 5:10am and i was dropping my friend rosie off at her house. we pulled in her driveway which is on the left side of the house.. soo the view in front of us was between 2 houses with some trees.. we looked up and saw a large oval craft tilted slightly so we could partially see the underneath of the craft. it was silver and had lots of big red lights. it passed between the view of the 2 houses and disappeared behind her house. we estimated the craft to be maybe a block away. i said "what the f was that?" and she immediately said i think we just saw a ufo! so we backed up and pulled around the block to see where it went.. it literally took maybe 30seconds to get around to where it should have been in view but could not find it. we even tried calling the nearby airport to inquire if there were any low flying planes in the area at that time.. the first time she was told they did not have that info and when i called back a few minutes later i was put on hold  until i eventually hung up. we proceeded to drive around for the next hour in search of the craft. we thought we saw something in the next town but can't be sure if that was a plane or not.. we did see some low flying planes which were clearly planes.. this just reinforced our initial sighting seeing the difference between the two.
content.summary: Oval silver red lights!

content.detailedDescription:
Eufaula, ok. 25 miles north of mcalester, ok. next to hwy 69/75:
  it was just after dark (7:05pm).  i was outside my place of employment waiting for my wife to pick me up, when i noticed a large bright object over the western horizon.  at first glance, i assumed that it was mars, but it caught my attention because it was too big and was flashing different colors. it appeared to be motionless.  i watched it for a few minutes in between looking for my wife and looking back inside the building to see what time it was(my wife was late). between about 7:10 and 7:15 the light really caught my attention because it suddenly burst into motion taking off upwards and toward the e.S.E. the light became muted and solid white. it appeared to be moving at a leisurly rate of speed.  at about the time it crossed the highway, it suddenly shifted to a red color. i watched it for a few more seconds, and then i glanced around to see if there was anyone else around that i could get to verify what i was seeing.  everyone else was inside the building, so i looked back up at the object and it was just suddenly gone, like instantly.  i was still waiting on my ride and scanning the sky for another glimpse, when about 5 minutes after the object dissappeared, the sky suddenly filled up with about half a dozen fast moving aircraft. two were flying in loose formation from w to e and there were one or two more under them going e to w.  my impression was that they were searching for the thing i had seen. after a couple more minutes, another jet came hauling ass out of the south with afterburners screaming and shot off towards the north.  after that, everything quieted down and my wife finally showed up.  the whole thing lasted about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Mysterious light followed by fighter jets

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were on our way up to bed when a bright movement out the window caught my son's eye. the three of us, my 17 year old, my husband and i saw a very bright light in the night sky. it had a white light quality, very intense, periodically changing colors to red, darting around in the sky to the southwest. it was obvious it was not a helicopter or other, due to the fact that it would dart too quickly to the far left and right, drop down a very far distance and come back up to where it was before. we watched this for almost two hours, as it changed positions, sometimes fading out and then coming back to the same intensity of light. as we were watching it, it just disappeared completely.
content.summary: Very bright star-like, chng colors, s/w sky darting far left, then right...

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were on our way up to bed when a bright movement out the window caught my son's eye. the three of us, my 17 year old, my husband and i saw a very bright light in the night sky. it had a white light quality, very intense, periodically changing colors to red, darting around in the sky to the southwest. it was obvious it was not a helicopter or other, due to the fact that it would dart too quickly to the far left and right, drop down a very far distance and come back up to where it was before. we watched this for almost two hours, as it changed positions, sometimes fading out and then coming back to the same intensity of light. as we were watching it, it just disappeared completely.
content.summary: Very bright star-like, chng colors, s/w sky darting far left, then right...

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a bright silver object in a clear blue sky and it did not move at all. it was over heathrow airports flight path. i observed this for 5-6 minutes untill it gave a bright flash and then a second flash but dimmer then it was no where to be seen.
content.summary: Stationary flashed gone

content.detailedDescription: I unzipped the backyard tent to get the power=er cord for hooligan and big chuck show. as i unzipped the tent facing the house at 1 15 or so the backyard became high noon. i have more than i can type. i find it difficult to type this. please ask me and i can recount.
content.summary: Daark inside with viewing and multicolored sparks eminating from centr. torned nigh to day. haad a whispy tail of multicolored sparks. moveved slow an =d headed towards barberton ohio high school.

content.detailedDescription: I have reported this object to you guys before but i have seen it for a second time tonight in ankeny outside of the dmacc campus as i was heading towards my car i noticed a bright white light in the sky at first the object was heading north but as i was observing it it started to come my way {west} then the flashing light died out then after a few seconds it came back on but this time it started flashing very slowly and then the object started glowing red it also looked stationary i was walking with a fellow student at the time but i didn't want to sound stupid and point out the craft in the sky with this object to i felt like i was being observed because the object wasn't moving very quickly at all what was weird also was when i got in my car the object vanished just gone out of sight that's why i felt like i was being watched because once i was out of sight the craft left very strange things have happened lately
content.summary: Another strange obect that had a bright white flashing light and was glowing red

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:00 a.M. and i was waiting for couple friends to leave crystal, co.  it happened on celebrated memorial day of 1977.  i sat in the bed of my truck in a beach collapsable chair.  i was watching airplanes go from west to east to get into the landing pattern at stapleton airport.  the pattern started (west-east) at one end of the valley and ended at the other end valley where the mtns. got in the way.

i saw one jet dissarear at the east end of the valley where i picked up a ufo flying at a very fast speed, it way grey and brown streaked (i couldn't tell if it was brown with grey streaks or brown with grey streaks).  i watched for about 15 seconds go from one end of the valley to the other end on the valley.  i figured the airplanes going 4 times slower than the ufo.  the ufo made no noise, no sonic boom, no roar, nothing. 

i figured i would let my friend drive us back to denver.  i didn't tell anyone about this sighting for a couple of weeks.
content.summary: It flew over me at 1,200 to 1,500 mph.  it was brownish-grayish in color, no noise, or vapor trail.

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning hours, i was looking out at the stars in the sky from my bedroom window.  we live in the hill country and the sky was very clear that evening.  i noticed a bright light in the north east, thinking it might be a star.  it was much, much brighter than the other stars and began to move very quickly both vertically and horizontally.  the lights seemed to pulsate, and the vehicle moved at rapid speeds.  i couldn't take my eyes off it as it was unlike anything i have ever observed in the night sky.  it lasted about 10-15 minutes and disappeared.
content.summary: Was looking out at the sky and viewed an unusual object hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking from my car to my apartment when i looked up and saw 3 small spheres pinkish in color seeming to hover in 12 o'clock position directly above me.  then seemed to hang there for a bit.  i ran inside to get my video camera and had trouble seeing them in the lcd viewfinder (very bright/very few clouds).  when i would look up with my sunglasses on, i could see them they began to move due east into the horizon until i couldn't see them again.  they were in the following formation.


                 .2


     .1                             .3


they seemed to resemble the one object i filmed the previous saturday.
content.summary: There were 3 of them i could see, pinkish hue small spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from lunch, and i happened to look up and see the light (pinkish) hovering in the clouds in the north west sky.  initially, i thought it might be a balloon.  however, it just was hanging there.  i ran in my apartment and got my video camera and filmed it. i had a hard time focusing on it or finding it with my camera due to it being so bright -- very hard to see the lcd screen in the day light.  

finally i lost track of the craft as it moved through the clouds. 

<object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="http://www.Youtube.Com/v/wcx5uhmphhu&rel=1"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.Youtube.Com/v/wcx5uhmphhu&rel=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="355"></embed></object>
content.summary: A pinkish hue light hovering and then moving in a north west direction

content.detailedDescription:
I could not sleep, got up to go to bathroom and looked out window into back yard. i live in the country on four acres.  the back fence and the neighbors field adjoining goes up into a slight slope.  on the other side of slope is a bunch of trees.  i saw a bright orange almost red orange in middle of trees.  my first thought was the moon and i realized there was no moon.  my second thought was someones' home on other side of hill might be burning.  watched for a couple of seconds and light started to climb. it cleared the trees and appeared to be moving to the east.  it appeared to stop and brightness of orange seemed to change to a lighter orange, almost white light.  it appeared to stand still, and instead of moving east, the light seemed like it was moving straight toward my house.  it sat there for a second and instead went in a south eastern direction.  as it progressed along the top of the hill the light appeared to lose some of the bright orange and more white light.  it continued along a straight, steady speed across the horizon, not fast.  when the object started a southeastern track, it appeared to get longer instead of a circle as it first appeared. i watched until i lost view.

 i called the police department in campbellsville and they said it was a plane.  please tell me what type of plane looks like solid orange and where was the flashing lights?  i've seen, well really not seen, but heard planes at night and seen the flashing lights.  there was neither. i would love to have someone tell me what this was.  i had never seen anything like it before.  i am a 64 year old, educated woman and i am not prone to seeing things unexplainable.  contrary to the police department, it was not an airplane.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large circular, bright orange object in south eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: Refer to my earlier description
content.summary: I am a lucid individual.  wake up from dead sleep look out my living room back window,  large spinning vibrating disc shaped craft straight out of ciothe 3rd kind

content.detailedDescription: At 9:15 am  saturday sunny day no clouds walked outside our company garage, looked up and saw an orange color sphere high above in the sky on a noth east direction,asked our dispather if she could come out and see this thing she was able to see it too with the naked eye ,she had a small pair of binoculars in her car but could not see i did and whith them the shape was disc all gold and at the bottom like mustard red color took some pictures with a canon powershot a560 4xoptical zoom i cannott see it on the camera maybe when i download them into my computer i might see something it was kind of low at the begining and suddenly it disapear and was now seen to the west at a high altitude it kind of disappear and appeared just stood still for another 20 minutes and then it was gone total time aproximately 40 minutes at fist didnt notice any  airplains comming in for landind at lax after that thing got higher in altitude noticed that planes started to show,cant say how high it was but it was high ...
content.summary: Gold color sphere/ w/naked eye -disc shape w/binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
I was home alone and decided to go to the kitchen to get a glass of water and maybe find a snack. just as i approached the kitchen/dining room area (they're the same room and we have a bay-window/patio door there) i noticed what i immediately thought was a helicopter about 300-400 feet away, just across the street and above the tree-line. because we kind of live in the country, i thought that was unusual... then it hit me that i couldn't hear any noise at all! and then the obvious shape difference hit me like a bag of rocks and i ran for my camera - literally (i almost tripped over a rug).

i don't know how long it was there before i saw it, but it hung around for about 2 or 3 minutes after i noticed it... not moving or flashing or anything. the only thing i noticed was a sort of wavy-ness of the air surrounding the object - that's probably what stuck me most, actually. it resembled kind of what you see over a hot road on a summer day. it was getting dark, but i distinctly remember the dark tree line shimmering just below the object, against the sky-glow.

i had just enough time to take a picture on my camera (before the batteries died), and then i got one on my cell phone right before it "disappeared" --- i say that, because i believe it just went directly away from me at a high speed very suddently... it actually appeared to grow smaller and disappear, but curve up slightly as it was doing so. the direction was about directly westward i believe.

long ago, when i was a young kid, i remember seeing a funny light in the sky (from very far away) and watching it do all sorts of "tricks" ~ but i couldn't actually see it as an object. this is the only other time that i have seen something this close, that i know from my own eyes what i saw in a detailed manner. very exciting indeed (although the first couple nights were difficult to sleep well!)
content.summary: Just outside my property!

content.detailedDescription:
At around 8:30pm me and my wife came from dinner at carlos pizza in tagaytay city and was going home, she was driving the car while i was staring at the sky because it was cloudy and no stars are being seen (due to the dense cloud cover). at the national highway going to sta. rosa city i noticed that there are 7 big bright red lights on the sky but there are no other stars in the sky at that time. i began to realized that what i saw are ufos. i told my wife and ordered her to park the car at the side of the road so that we can see them clearly. i went out of the car and saw a total of 8 big red bright lights, slowly moving coming from the east, no sound, and slowly ascending and disappearing for about more than 5 minutes for each objects. i told my wife to video it using her cellphone and we just caught in video the last (8th)object slowly ascending to the sky.

my reaction are: thrilled, scared but excited.
content.summary: Red lights, slow, low flying, but ascending to the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home through the texas hill country outside of austin, texas (usa)and saw a very large disc-like object in the sky.  its shape reminded me of the object featured in the close encounters movie but the one i saw was smaller and it had more red than blue.  it also did not have the height  of the fictitious one in the movie. the object i saw had a top section and a bottom level that was at least twice the diameter of the top section making it more like a two-level birthday cake except with a rounded, curved  sides. it was perhaps a mile away and so big and bright that i thought it was someone's idea of an expensive joke or perhaps some promotional scheme but as far as i could tell, there was no banner or sign anywhere close to it.  the object was entirely lit up like a christmas tree.  there was white, red, blue, yellow, green light and perhaps some other colors but it was not at all garish or tacky looking. i have to say that despite the presence of thousands of lights in so many colors, they all complemented each other and it really was the most marvelous sighting. the object remained stationary in the sky and the lights on it were twinkling, not flashing. my next reaction was to note the time.  i wished very much that i had something to capture the sighting but i had no camera or phone with me.  it was the brightest, most spectacular thing i've ever seen.  i then thought that i was going crazy and had to pinch my arm.  i was not under the influence of anything: all of my life, i've been allergic to cigarette smoke and cannot even drink alcohol or tolerate medication like ibuprofen so there was nothing impacting my visual or mental acuity at the time of the sighting.  then i wished that there was someone else around to corroborate what i was seeing.  i thought for sure that something so big and bright would be seen by many and i felt that maybe someone would have taken a picture of it by that time and i could see it again in a photo and know it was for real.  i wanted to stay in that spot and just observe what might happen next but i had a sick pet waiting for me at home and i needed to give him his medicine.  i remember continuing my drive, hoping that i wasn't making a mistake by leaving.  the whole sighting took only a few minutes (no more than five).  because i was driving away, i lost sight of it very shortly after leaving that spot. i was certain that the newspaper would report it the next day but i found absolutely nothing in the austin american statesman, austin's daily newspaper.

i really haven't spoken about this incident except to one relative and two friends. i had been concerned about being an object of derision if i were to come out more openly with this information. i just wish i had some photo to prove what i had seen.  i decided to submit this report because in the last year, i've been diagnosed with a serious illness and i don't want this miraculous sighting to just die with me.  i would like to know if someone else has seen it. my profession has been in the fields of marketing research and consulting and i usually believe things when i can substantitate with numbers and fact-based research.  however, i cannot explain the presence of what i saw with empirical research nor will i try to.  there are times when i question the veracity of what i had seen but i do know what i saw.  i consider myself extremely fortunate to have seen it at all.  i only wish that i had been able to share it with someone else.
content.summary: The most beautiful thing i've ever seen in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While working as a deputy sheriff. i was sitting in my squad car along us 41 just north of williamsport. i was watching traffic on the highway, when what looked like a ball of fire went over my car travleing in a north east direction. i thought it was an aircraft that was on fire. i waited a minute to see if was going to crash. it did not. i then call the attica city car, and asked if they could see anything. they said that they were downtown, and could not see. i then heard a tippicanoe county sheriff car call and said that they could see somthing in the sky travling in a north east direction. a carrol county car then reported the same thing. shortly after that a cass county reported the same thing. 
years later (1984) while working (sheriff dept.) myself and a resurve deputy saw the same thing at a town called west lebanon. the object was moving in a northeast direction. i stopped my car and we got out and watched the object. i even made a motorest stop and get out an look with us. the object then disappeared in the clouds.
content.summary: Cylinder like  burning object

content.detailedDescription: On 2/8/08 i was driving to work and approximately at 8:15 p.M., i saw two yellowish lights in the sky. shortly after that two more lights gloomed and aligned with the other two lights. all four lights remaind glowing for less that five seconds. the first thing that came to my mind was the incident that occurred in phoenix, az the lights were very similar to those. what made me lose sight of the lights was the big lake burm located in the area. first thing i did after the lights disappeared was call my wife and told her what i had seen hoping that someone else had seen lights and reported them too.
content.summary: Four yellowish lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: As i was about to leave for work i noticed something strange flying in from the north as it flew closer i started to realize it wasn't anyhting i have seen before it was a long tube looking object with windows or holes one of the two this object was tan colored and was flying in a straight path north to south and was flying below the clouds the clouds were not high in the sky so the object was pretty low now this object was not a plane because the object didn't have any wings i am just puzzled with what has been happening in the area lately truly bizarre
content.summary: A long tan colored tube ufo with windows or holes

content.detailedDescription: I'm standing in my driveway about 6:10am, in houston, tx, harris county, 2/8/2008, getting ready to go to work on a very beautiful clear cold morning, looking up skyward and wondering if i will ever see a ufo.  i look up towards the northwest sky and i see a star, then it moves!  i blink and think my eyes are acting up. it moves again and through the sky straight towards the southeast and makes a quick little zig then a quick little zag, i mean very quickly! like a twitch in your eye quick. it goes straight again a little ways then a very quick zig zag again. it does it again.  i'm thinking maybe it's a plane, but it's way to high in the sky and going too quickly. it still looks like a star, can't be a plane.  it keeps going straight towards the southeast, quick little zig zags now and then, until it goes past a big star (planet? not sure) in the southeast sky.  it passes the big star in the southeast about a quarter past it, the moving star just disappeares straight upwards, into the heavens. never to be seen by my eyes again!  very interesting event in my life!  never have i saw anything like that, ever!  i've always wished i would see a ufo in my life time.  do you guys think that's what i saw?  i'm happy with this!  a lower to earth, ufo would be great too!  very thrilling!  god bless us all!
content.summary: I  saw a star in the southwest sky over houston, tx,  2-8-2008, then it moved through the sky straight  then a little zig then a zag
